channel.title: PvP Area Help

item.title: PvP Area Help
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Should be

public boolean inWild() { if((absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966) || (absX >= 3392 && absX <= 3190 && absY >= 3425 && absY <= 3432)) { return true; } return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: PvP Area Help
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

Okay, so i’ve been working on a hyperion 474, and I need help with this Pvp Area.

Here’s my code:

	public boolean inWild() {
		if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966) || 
		(absX >= 3392 && absX <= 3190 && absY >= 3425 && absY <= 3432) {
			return true;
		}
			return false;
		}

Here’s my error:

src\server\model\players\Player.java:732: error: illegal start of expression
                if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966) ||

                                                                             ^
src\server\model\players\Player.java:733: error: ';' expected
                (absX >= 3392 && absX <= 3190 && absY >= 3425 && absY <= 3432) {

                                                                              ^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
